articles.title: Huawei's Watch Ultra is a long-lasting rugged smartwatch that looks the part | Engadget - Engadget
articles.description: It's targeted at technical divers and other rugged outdoorsy-types.
articles.content: Huawei may be persona non grata in the US but the company is still pushing out products for the rest of the world. Its latest is the Watch Ultimate, a super-premium wearable for extreme sports types … [+2668 chars]
